celebrationSection1.title: The art of living
celebrationSection1.description: With over 40 years of mastery, we have evolved a simple vision into a legacy of flawless design. We curate the true art of luxury living, creating spaces that stand as timeless testaments to quality.

celebrationSection2.title: Whispered narratives
celebrationSection2.description: Through our bespoke mastery, every corner becomes a silent chapter of your unique story.

cherfanPlus.title: Light and Space
cherfanPlus.description: Beyond the blueprint lies a home with a soul. Journey through our curated world—from the heart of the kitchen to the finest living details; designed to elevate every moment.

kitchen.label: KITCHEN
kitchen.title: Kitchen
kitchen.description: Kitchens imagined as sanctuaries for the soul, where the quiet ritual of creation meets the warmth of a shared life. Every surface is a canvas for your cooking and hosting gatherings.

masterBedroom.label: MASTER BEDROOM
masterBedroom.title: Master Bedroom
masterBedroom.description: A playground for your design preferences, where life is found in the small things, the colors, and the feelings that surround you.

closet.label: CLOSET
closet.title: Closet
closet.description: Bespoke structures for the organized life, where master-craftsmanship breathes soul into every corner and elevates habits into art.

kidsBedroom.label: KIDS BEDROOM
kidsBedroom.title: Kids Bedroom
kidsBedroom.description: A child's room is more than a place to sleep. We create safe, enchanting worlds where the little ones can dream, create, and own their space.

cards.label: Engineered for perfection
cards.description: Our 5,000 square meter factory blends advanced machinery with artisanal mastery to ensure the flawless execution of your most ambitious designs.

cards.label: Quiet Wonder
cards.description: Serene interiors that invite calm and warmth.

cards.label: Celestial Moments
cards.description: Spaces tuned for gatherings and celebration.
